member.name: M:Walgelijk.OpenTK.OpenALAudioRenderer.GetCurrentSamples(Walgelijk.Sound,System.Span{System.Single})

member.name: M:Walgelijk.OpenTK.OpenTKWindow.InitialiseDedicatedGraphics
member.summary: Sets the default video card to Nvidia instead of the low-end Intel GPU for laptops with multiple GPUs. This can be overridden per app in the Windows graphics menu.
